title: Task 26

question.text: What do the phrases technical issues and technical glitches refer to?

answers.feedback: This option means difficulties related to creative work, which is not the same as the phrases.
This option refers to individual challenges, which is not the same as the phrases.
This option refers to challenges related to interpersonal interactions, which is not the same as the phrases.

description: The phrases technical issues and technical glitches both refer to problems or difficulties related to technology or a particular system.
